00031 
00032 /*
00033  * Define types for the Value<>-System here.
00034  * There must be a streaming output available for every type used here.
00035  * template<typename charT, typename traits,typename TYPE > basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<(basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out,const TYPE& s)
00036  */
00037 
00038 
00039 #define DEF_TYPE(TYPE,NAME)  \
00040     template<> const char Value<TYPE>::m_typeName[]=#NAME
00041 
00042 DEF_TYPE( bool, boolean );
00043 
00044 DEF_TYPE( int8_t, s8bit );
00045 DEF_TYPE( uint8_t, u8bit );
00046 
00047 DEF_TYPE( int16_t, s16bit );
00048 DEF_TYPE( uint16_t, u16bit );
00049 
00050 DEF_TYPE( int32_t, s32bit );
00051 DEF_TYPE( uint32_t, u32bit );
00052 
00053 DEF_TYPE( int64_t, s64bit );
00054 DEF_TYPE( uint64_t, u64bit );
00055 
00056 DEF_TYPE( float, float );
00057 DEF_TYPE( double, double );
00058 
00059 DEF_TYPE( color24, color24 );
00060 DEF_TYPE( color48, color48 );
00061 
00062 DEF_TYPE( fvector4, fvector4 );
00063 DEF_TYPE( dvector4, dvector4 );
00064 DEF_TYPE( ivector4, ivector4 );
00065 
00066 DEF_TYPE( ilist, list<int32_t> );
00067 DEF_TYPE( dlist, list<double> );
00068 DEF_TYPE( slist, list<string> );
00069 
00070 DEF_TYPE( std::complex<float>, complex<float> );
00071 DEF_TYPE( std::complex<double>, complex<double> );
00072 
00073 DEF_TYPE( std::string, string );
00074 DEF_TYPE( Selection, selection );
00075 DEF_TYPE( boost::posix_time::ptime, timestamp );
00076 DEF_TYPE( boost::gregorian::date, date );
00077 
00078 namespace _internal
00079 {
00080 struct type_lister {
00081     std::map< unsigned short, std::string > &m_map;
00082     bool m_withValues, m_withValuePtrs;
00083     type_lister( std::map< unsigned short, std::string > &map, bool withValues, bool withValuePtrs ): m_map( map ), m_withValues( withValues ), m_withValuePtrs( withValuePtrs ) {}
00084     template<typename SRC> void operator()( SRC ) {//will be called by the mpl::for_each
00085         if( m_withValues )m_map.insert( std::make_pair( util::Value<SRC>::staticID, util::Value<SRC>::staticName() ) );
00086 
00087         if( m_withValuePtrs )m_map.insert( std::make_pair( data::ValuePtr<SRC>::staticID, data::ValuePtr<SRC>::staticName() ) );
00088     }
00089 };
00090 
00091 }
00092 
00093 std::map< unsigned short, std::string > getTypeMap( bool withValues, bool withValuePtrs )
00094 {
00095     std::map< unsigned short, std::string > ret;
00096     boost::mpl::for_each<_internal::types>( _internal::type_lister( ret, withValues, withValuePtrs ) );
00097     return ret;
00098 }
00099 
00100 std::map< std::string, unsigned short > getTransposedTypeMap( bool withValues, bool withValuePtrs )
00101 {
00102     typedef std::map< std::string, unsigned short> transposedMapType;
00103     typedef std::map< unsigned short, std::string > mapType;
00104     transposedMapType ret;
00105     BOOST_FOREACH( mapType::const_reference ref, util::getTypeMap( withValues, withValuePtrs ) ) {
00106         ret[ref.second] = ref.first;
00107     }
00108     return ret;
00109 }
00110 
00111 }
00112 }
